name: pnp-create-team-and-add-members-and-owners
title: Create a Microsoft Teams team and bulk add members from CSV file
shortDescription: This sample script shows you how to create a Team and add members and owners using a CSV.
longDescription: This sample script shows you how to create a Team and add members and owners using a CSV.
